segments.text: Mr . Emory , I â€™ d like to take this afternoon off if it's all right with you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But Steven , you've called in sick 3 times during the last three weeks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know , Mr . Emory . I'm sorry . But I really need to see the doctor this afternoon . I feel dizzy and I can't concentrate on my work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right , then . But don't forget to bring a doctors note tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2
